name: The Unexpected
description:
Hi, my name is Jelle and I am a young game developper. I made this game in 48 hours. It is the first time that I participate in a gam jam. All assets, mechanics, etc. are made by myself. You can check me out on YouTube if you want :Dev Jelle.

To control the game you can use WASD and SPACE BAR or ARROW LEFT-RIGHT and SPACE BAR. All the rest is up to you. Enjoy playing and let me know what you think of it.
